trends: There have been 216 other sightings in Philadelphia
There was one other sighting in Philadelphia on or around November 26th 2008
Summary: Triangular object appeared in the sky with lights about 80 ft up, no sound, about 40 ft wide, hovered, then was accompanied by a darting sphere.
divs: Sighting DetailsAccording to my grandson (11 yrs), he and 3 friends were out at about 7:00 p.m. on 11-26-08, and saw a large object overhead hovering, making no sound. It was triangular in shape, had lights. It was accompanied by a sphere of light which bounced around it. They all took off quickly. The triangular object was about 80 ft off the ground and was about 40 ft wide. Casey made pictures of these objects. I believe he said they were pursued by jets. We live close to the Willow Grove Naval Air Base. I know Casey was telling the truth as he saw it, and the friends can confirm it. He tried to take pictures with his camera phone, but they didn't come out. I'm sure he would not mind telling you what he saw in more detail. Thanks for all you do. Sincerely, Diane Gatley
